summary: TikTok is a popular social media app owned by the Chinese company ByteDance. Users can share short videos, from 3 seconds to 1 hour long, covering various topics. It has become one of the most downloaded apps globally, with over 2 billion downloads as of 2020. TikTok's success has created global trends in food and music. However, it has also faced criticism for data privacy issues, mental health impacts, and the spread of misinformation. Some countries have restricted or banned TikTok due to these concerns and the potential collection of user data by the Chinese government.
title: TikTok
